Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits a state or local authority from employing or designating a lobbyist to engage in lobbying
Summary: Prohibits a state or local authority, or subsidiary thereof, from retaining, contracting, employing, or designating a lobbyist to engage in lobbying; allows for the cancellation of pre-existing contracts.
LawCode: Add ยง2859, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting a state or local authority from employing or designating a lobbyist to engage in lobbying
